languages.text: "Очень немногие в Империуме могут рассчитывать на привилегию суда. Эти люди в круг избранных не входят".

traits.locale_text: "Очень немногие в Империуме могут рассчитывать на привилегию суда. Эти люди в круг избранных не входят".

languages.text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."
languages.original_text: "Очень немногие в Империуме могут рассчитывать на привилегию суда. Эти люди в круг избранных не входят".

traits.locale_text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."
"Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."

"Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."

languages.text: 「帝国において裁判という特権を与えられる人はごくわずかだよ。あの人たちは、その中には含まれていないんだ」
languages.original_text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国において裁判という特権を与えられる人はごくわずかだよ。あの人たちは、その中には含まれていないんだ」

languages.text: "Nur sehr wenige im Imperium erhalten das Privileg eines Prozesses. Diese Leute sind nicht Teil dieses Kreises."
languages.original_text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."

traits.locale_text: "Nur sehr wenige im Imperium erhalten das Privileg eines Prozesses. Diese Leute sind nicht Teil dieses Kreises."

languages.text: « Il est rare que l'on accorde le privilège d'un procès aux sujets de l'Imperium. Ces gens ne font pas partie des chanceux. »
languages.original_text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."

traits.locale_text: « Il est rare que l'on accorde le privilège d'un procès aux sujets de l'Imperium. Ces gens ne font pas partie des chanceux. »

languages.text: «Poca gente en el Imperium goza del privilegio de un juicio. Estas personas no pertenecen a ese selecto círculo».
languages.original_text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."

traits.locale_text: «Poca gente en el Imperium goza del privilegio de un juicio. Estas personas no pertenecen a ese selecto círculo».

languages.text: “整个帝国之中，很少有人能享有参加审判的特权，那些人不属于那个小圈子。”
languages.original_text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."

traits.locale_text: “整个帝国之中，很少有人能享有参加审判的特权，那些人不属于那个小圈子。”

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'ta duruşmayla yargılanma ayrıcalığına sahip ufak bir zümre var. O zümreden değil bunlar."
languages.original_text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'ta duruşma ayrıcalığına sahip ufak bir zümre var. Bunlar, o zümreden değil."

languages.original_text: "Very few in the Imperium receive the privilege of a trial. Those people aren't part of that circle."
